ThunderDex War Thunder Naujienos Naujausi Atnaujinimai Karo "Mašinos" Mėgstamiausi Nustatymai Mūšio reitingas: AB RB SB N/A Tyrimas: Pirkimas: Rinkinys arba Dovana Aprašymas: Bendra Informacija: Pliusai ir Minusai: Pliusai: Minusai: Tuščias Sąrašąs Įkeliama… Prašau palaukite… Neįmanoma prisijungti prie serveriom Klaida: kažkas ne taip pavyko Namai Lėktuvai Sraigtasparniai Tankai Laivai Mėgstamiausi Nemėgstamas ❤️ • AUKA • ❤️ Dinaminis Temų Kūrimas Įgalinti Dinaminią Temą %s ❤️ Paremkite Mano Darbą Aukodami ❤️ Išvalyti talpyklą Išvalykite išsaugotus nustatymus, tekstus ir vaizdus Ačiū! Perskaitykite pakeitimų žurnalą Duomenų nerasta… Ieškokite transporto priemonės Ieškokite čia… Išvalyti paiešką Prisijunkite prie „ThunderDex“ Discord grupės Būkite kažko nuostabaus dalimi. Naudojimas mūšiuose: Wiki War Thunder Wiki Klientas Prisijunkite prie „ThunderDex“ subreddito! Spustelėkite čia, kad prisijungtumėte prie „ThunderDex“ subreddit! 😁 Check out the cool features planned for 2024 Features & plans for %s in 2024 Upcoming ThunderDex Features ThunderDex was initially conceived in 2023.
I was a frequent user of the War Thunder Wiki and got tired of using it on my browser.
With 10+ years of coding knowledge, I developed this app in a few months and decided to release it to everyone for FREE!

I really hope you enjoy the app! - HiFii How do I contribute? ThunderDex Contributors Tdikristof_ on Discord (Hungarian translations) Theslimyboi on Discord (Lithuanian translations) Proxima on Discord (German translations) About
Donate with Google Pay Thank you for considering a donation!

Send the payment to mbqonxda@gmail.com Open Google Pay Copy Email address Google Pay not installed! Launching Google Play Store… com.google.android.apps.nbu.paisa.user market://details?id=com.google.android.apps.nbu.paisa.user Copied Google Pay Email mbqonxda@gmail.com
• Add extra customization options (vehicle image size, etc) • Improvements to the vehicle image viewer • Add more translations • Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option • Even more improvements to loading and performance • Adding more information and user requested information too • Add a War Thunder wallpaper section with a download ability from the site

Image saved to Gallery Failed to save image Failed to load image
Hello and thank you for using ThunderDex.

The BEST War Thunder Wikipedia client for Android.

Please, consider donating if you are enjoying the app... a LOT of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal option.

-HiFii Add extra customization options (vehicle image size, etc)

Filter vehicles by rank instead of alphabetically

Add option to choose how vehicles are filtered

Improvements to the vehicle image viewer

Add an option to download selected vehicle images

Add more translations

Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option

Even more improvements to loading and performance

Adding more information and user requested information too

Add a wallpaper section with a download ability!! (from the war thunder Wikipedia wallpaper site)
Changelog History
